columns.name: arn
columns.description: The namespace Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the container instance.

columns.name: ec2_instance_id
columns.description: The EC2 instance ID of the container instance.

columns.name: agent_connected
columns.description: True if the agent is connected to Amazon ECS.

columns.name: agent_update_status
columns.description: The status of the most recent agent update.

columns.name: attachments
columns.description: The resources attached to a container instance, such as elastic network interfaces.

columns.name: attributes
columns.description: The attributes set for the container instance.

columns.name: capacity_provider_name
columns.description: The capacity provider associated with the container instance.

columns.name: pending_tasks_count
columns.description: The number of tasks on the container instance that are in the PENDING status.

columns.name: registered_at
columns.description: The Unix timestamp for when the container instance was registered.

columns.name: registered_resources
columns.description: CPU and memory that can be allocated on this container instance to tasks.

columns.name: remaining_resources
columns.description: CPU and memory that is available for new tasks.

columns.name: running_tasks_count
columns.description: CPU and memory that is available for new tasks.

columns.name: status
columns.description: The status of the container instance.

columns.name: status_reason
columns.description: The reason that the container instance reached its current status.

columns.name: version
columns.description: The reason that the container instance reached its current status.

columns.name: version_info
columns.description: Version information for the Amazon ECS container agent and Docker daemon running on the container instance.
